#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
int testcases;
int number;
cin >> testcases;
    for(int x = 0; x < testcases; x++)
        {
            cin >> number;
                if(number%2!=0)
                    cout << "Lannisters always pays their debts" << endl;
                    
                else
                    cout << "Valar Morghulis" << endl;   
        }   
return 0;
}
